info.title: Products API
info.description: API REST profesional para gesti√≥n de productos

get.description: Returns the currently authenticated user information

post.description: Revokes all authentication tokens for the current user

200.description: Logged out from all devices successfully

message.example: Logged out from all devices successfully

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns an authentication token
Creates a new user account and returns an authentication token

get.description: Returns a list of all currencies

post.description: Creates a new currency with the provided data

get.description: Returns a single currency by its ID

put.description: Updates an existing currency with the provided data

delete.description: Deletes a currency by its ID

409.description: Currency cannot be deleted (has associated products)

message.example: Cannot delete currency because it has associated products

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all system event logs (POST, PUT, DELETE operations)

parameters.name: event_type
parameters.description: Filter by event type (POST, PUT, DELETE)

get.description: Returns a single event log by its ID
Downloads an Excel file containing event logs filtered by date range (start_date and end_date)

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date (YYYY-MM-DD). If not provided, exports all events.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date (YYYY-MM-DD). If not provided, exports all events up to today.

get.description: Returns a list of all products with their currency information

post.description: Creates a new product with the provided data. The currency_id must exist in the currencies table.

create_product_prices.description: If true, automatically creates product prices for all currencies (except the product's base currency). Default: false

get.description: Returns a single product by its ID with currency information

put.description: Updates an existing product with the provided data. The currency_id must exist in the currencies table if provided.

delete.description: Deletes a product by its ID

get.description: Downloads an Excel file containing all products with their details. The file includes: ID, Name, Description, Price, Currency, Currency Symbol, Tax Cost, Manufacturing Cost, Created At, and Updated At.
Search products using multiple filters: name, currency, price range, tax cost, manufacturing cost, and sorting options

parameters.name: currency_symbol
parameters.description: Filter by currency symbol (e.g., USD, EUR)

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Sort by field (name, price, tax_cost, manufacturing_cost, created_at, updated_at)

get.summary: Get all prices for a product
get.description: Returns a list of all prices for a product in different currencies

post.summary: Create or update a product price in a different currency
post.description: Creates or updates a price for a product in a different currency. The price is calculated as: product.price * currency.exchange_rate. If a price already exists for this product and currency, it will be overwritten.

currency_id.description: Currency ID (must be different from product's base currency)

200.description: Product price created or updated successfully

get.summary: Export all product prices to Excel
get.description: Downloads an Excel file containing all product prices with product name, currency name, and price

data.description: Complete payload data including all request data. Contains the full request payload and any additional data.

payload.description: Complete request payload with all fields sent in the request

sanctum.description: Enter your bearer token in the format: Bearer {token}

tags.name: Event Logs
tags.description: API endpoints for viewing system event logs

tags.name: Product Prices
tags.description: API endpoints for managing product prices in different currencies
